#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-policy-text, 
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-b-addl-desc .onetrust-pc-btn-handler, 
.onetrust-accept-btn-handler, 
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-gv-list-handler,
#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-pc-desc,
#onetrust-reject-all-handler, 
#onetrust-accept-btn-handler,
#onetrust-pc-btn-handler { 
    font-family: "Non-Dottee-Light" !important;
    font-size: 12px; 
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler,
#onetrust-banner-sdk,
#onetrust-pc-btn-handler,
#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    border-radius: 16px !important;
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk .has-reject-all-button .banner-actions-container {
    max-width: 60%;
    width: auto;
    display: flex;
}

button#onetrust-accept-btn-handler {
    order: 1;
}

button#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    order: 2;
    margin-left: 11px;
}

button#onetrust-pc-btn-handler {
 
 order: 3; 
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group {
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk .has-reject-all-button #onetrust-pc-btn-handler {
    float: left;
    max-width: calc(40% - 18px);
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group {
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }

  #onetrust-banner-sdk .has-reject-all-button .banner-actions-container {
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }

  button#onetrust-accept-btn-handler {
    order: 1; 
    width: 100%; 
    max-width: 100%; 
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  button#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    order: 2; 
    width: 100%; 
    max-width: 100%; 
    margin-right: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  button#onetrust-pc-btn-handler,
  #onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-link-btn {
    order: 3; 
    width: 100%; 
    max-width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    text-align: center;
  }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 425px) {
    #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler, #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-reject-all-handler {
        margin-left: 0;
    }
}

// first we create OT library script
var host = window.location.hostname;
var OT_ID;
if (host.includes("intdigital")) {
	OT_ID = "7b5f236a-7014-4fda-8a63-1a1c83e6cb7e-test";
} else {
	OT_ID = "7b5f236a-7014-4fda-8a63-1a1c83e6cb7e";
}

function appendOneTrustScript() {
	var OTScript = document.createElement("script");
	OTScript.setAttribute("src", "https://cdn-ukwest.onetrust.com/consent/" + OT_ID + "/otSDKStub.js");
	OTScript.setAttribute("data-document-language", "true");
	OTScript.setAttribute("type", "text/javascript");
	OTScript.setAttribute("charset", "UTF-8");
	OTScript.setAttribute("data-domain-script", OT_ID);
	document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(OTScript);
    // 
    _satellite.logger.log("Append OneTrust script");
}


// Hide banner script
function hideOneTrustBanner() {
	var style = document.createElement("style");
	style.setAttribute("type", "text/css");
	style.setAttribute("charset", "UTF-8");
	document.head.appendChild(style);
	style.textContent = "#onetrust-banner-sdk {display: none}";
}

if (window.location.href.indexOf("/cookies") !== -1) {
	hideOneTrustBanner();
}

function OptanonWrapper() {
	// When consent is updated / set
	if (typeof OneTrust === "object") {
		OneTrust.OnConsentChanged(function (e) {
			window.setTimeout(function (e) {				
				_satellite.track("oneTrust - consent updated");
			}, 1000);
		});
	}
}

var trustArc_cookie = _satellite.cookie.get("notice_gdpr_prefs");
var trustArc_localStorage = localStorage.getItem("truste.eu.cookie.notice_gdpr_prefs");
var time = new Date();

//main part with conditions - IF NO TrustArc
if (!trustArc_cookie) {
  
	// One trust consent
	_satellite.setVar("consent type", "one trust");
	appendOneTrustScript();
	OptanonWrapper();
 
// IF TrustArc EXISTS  
} else if ( trustArc_cookie ) {
      // Trust Arc reconsent
      _satellite.setVar("consent type", "trust arc");

      // getting TA cookie groups to replace initial ones
      var consent = trustArc_cookie.split(":");
      var consent = consent[0].split("|");
      var consent = consent.map(function (i) {
          return Number(i);
      });
      consent.includes(1) ? (analytical = "1:1") : (analytical = "1:0");
      consent.includes(2) ? (preference = "2:1") : (preference = "2:0");
      consent.includes(3) ? (marketing = "3:1") : (marketing = "3:0");
      var TrustArcGroups = "groups=" + "0:1" + "," + analytical + "," + preference + "," + marketing;

      // adjusting time and creating newOptanonConsentCookie
      var timeString = String(time);
      var OTcookieTime = timeString.split(" ").join("+");
      var dummyOTCookie =
          "isGpcEnabled=&datestamp=Thu+Aug+01+2024+01:01:01+GMT+0300+(Eastern+European+Summer+Time)" +
          "&version=&browserGpcFlag=&isIABGlobal=&hosts=" +
          "&interactionCount=&isAnonUser=&landingPath=&" +
          TrustArcGroups;
  
      var cookieObject = localStorage.getItem("truste.eu.cookie.notice_gdpr_prefs");
      var cookieDetails = JSON.parse(cookieObject);
  
      //Fall back for missing expiry
      function ps() {
          // Tracking how many people have this error
          _satellite.setVar("consent type", "trust arc - fallback expiry");
          var plusThirtyDays = new Date();
          plusThirtyDays.setDate(time.getDate() + 30);
          _satellite.logger.error("missing expiry date fallback - TrustArc to OneTrust")
        
          return plusThirtyDays
      }
  
      var expiryDate = cookieDetails ? cookieDetails.expires : ps();
      //var expiryDate = cookieDetails.expires;

      //just dummy value to keep "OptanonAlertBoxClosed" - anyway value will be rewritten by OT library
      _satellite.cookie.set("OptanonConsent", dummyOTCookie, { expires: new Date(expiryDate), domain: ".ee.co.uk" });

      // prevent banner from firing
      var tzoffset = time.getTimezoneOffset() * 60000; //offset in milliseconds
      var alertBoxClosedCookieValue = new Date(Date.now() - tzoffset).toISOString().slice(0, -1);
      _satellite.cookie.set("OptanonAlertBoxClosed", alertBoxClosedCookieValue, { expires: new Date(expiryDate), domain: ".ee.co.uk", secure: true, SameSite: "None" });

      //
      appendOneTrustScript(); // fires and sets real "OptanonConsent" cookie value with any possible queries

      // reading real "OptanonConsent" cookie value after OT lib has been fired and preparing for replacing groups value
      var optanonConsent = _satellite.cookie.get("OptanonConsent");
      var consentSplit = optanonConsent.split("&");
      var OTlibraryConsent = consentSplit.filter(function (el) {
          if (el.includes("groups")) {
              return true;
          }
      });

      // replacing groups value with fullConsent
      let newOptanonConsentCookie = optanonConsent.replace(OTlibraryConsent, TrustArcGroups);
  
      _satellite.cookie.set("OptanonConsent", newOptanonConsentCookie, { expires: new Date(expiryDate), domain: ".ee.co.uk" });

      // removing TrustArc cookies
      function delete_cookie(name) {
          document.cookie = name + "=; Path=/; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/; Domain=.ee.co.uk";
      }

      delete_cookie("TAconsentID");
      delete_cookie("TAsessionID");
      delete_cookie("cmapi_cookie_privacy");
      delete_cookie("notice_gdpr_prefs");
      delete_cookie("notice_preferences");
      delete_cookie("notice_behavior");
      delete_cookie("notice_poptime");

      // removing TrustArc keys from local storage
      localStorage.removeItem("truste.eu.cookie.TAconsentID");
      localStorage.removeItem("truste.eu.cookie.cmapi_cookie_privacy");
      localStorage.removeItem("truste.eu.cookie.notice_gdpr_prefs");
      localStorage.removeItem("truste.eu.cookie.notice_preferences");
      localStorage.removeItem("truste.eu.cookie.cmapi_gtm_bl");
      localStorage.removeItem("truste.eu.cookie.notice_poptime");
      localStorage.removeItem("optout_domains");

      // Fire the update consent event as we are manually adding one trust cookies
      window.setTimeout(function (e) {
          _satellite.track("oneTrust - consent updated");
      }, 1000);
}
</script><script>
function Exhaust( options ) {

	this.version 	= "1.3.2";
	this.debugger 	= new options.ExhaustDebugger( this, new options.PrettyConsole() );

	this.events 	= {};
	this.defaults 	= {
		"init_timestamp" 	: new Date(),
		"init_location"	: document.location
	};

	this.timeline_index = [];
	this.init_queue 	= ( typeof _exhaust_init_queue === typeof [] ) ? _exhaust_init_queue : [];

	this.registerEvent( "_ALL" );

	if ( document.location.search.indexOf( "_exhaust.debug" ) > -1 ) {
		this.debugger.setEnabled( true );
	}

	//  It is advised to not use this for anything other than a dev tool
	if ( typeof CustomEvent == "function" ) {
		window.dispatchEvent( new CustomEvent( "Exhaust.init", {
			"detail": {
				"instance": this
			}
		}));
	} else {
		this.debugger.log( "%cExhaust: Unable to dispatch Exhaust.init to window.  Browser too old?", "background-color:red; border-radius:3px; color:white; font-weight:bold; padding:.15em .5em;" );
	}
	
}


Exhaust.prototype = {


	"eventExists": function( event_name ) {
		return ( this.events[ event_name ] ) ? true : false;
	},


	"getTimeline": function() {

		var events = [];
		
		function ExhaustTimeline( events ) {
			this.events = events;
		}

		for ( var i = 0, te; i < this.timeline_index.length; i++ ) {
			te = this.timeline_index[i]; 
			events.push( this.events[ te.event_name ].history[ te.i ] );
		}

		return new ExhaustTimeline( events );

	},


	"on": function( event_name, callback, options ) {

		if ( typeof callback !== "function" ) {
			this.debugger.log( "Callback for \"" + event_name + "\" is not a function" );
			return false;
		}

		options = options || {};

		options.label 			= options.label || "- no label -";
		options.trigger_history = ( options.trigger_history ) ? true : false;

		if ( typeof event_name === typeof "" ) {
			event_name = [ event_name ];
		}

		if ( typeof event_name !== typeof [] ) {
			return;
		}

		var self = this;

		event_name.forEach( function( name ) {

			self.registerEvent( name );

			self.events[ name ].callbacks.push({
				"label"		: options.label,
				"callback"	: callback
			});

			if ( options.trigger_history ) {
				self.triggerHistory( name, callback, options );
			}

			self.triggerPreloadQueue( name, self.init_queue );

		});

		return self;

	},

	
	"prepPayload": function ( pl ) {

		if ( typeof pl !== typeof {} ) {
			pl = {};
		}

		pl._defaults = {};

		pl._defaults.digitalData 	= ( window.digitalData ) ? JSON.parse( JSON.stringify( window.digitalData ) ) : {};
		pl._defaults.init_location 	= this.defaults.init_location;
		pl._defaults.init_timestamp = this.defaults.init_timestamp;
		pl._defaults.location		= document.location || false;
		pl._defaults.timestamp		= new Date();

		return pl;

	},


	"registerEvent": function( event_name ) {

		if ( !this.eventExists( event_name ) ) {
			this.events[ event_name ] = {
				"callbacks": [],
				"history": []
			};
			return true;
		}

		return false;
	},


	"trigger": function( event_name, payload ) {

		//  Prep the payload
		payload 				= this.prepPayload( payload );
		payload._event_name 	= event_name;
		

		//  Register the event if it doesn't exist
		this.registerEvent( event_name );

		//  Save the event to the timeline
		this.timeline_index.push({
			"event_name": event_name,
			"i": this.events[ event_name ].history.length
		});

		//  Store event into the history
		this.events[ event_name ].history.push( JSON.parse( JSON.stringify( payload ) ) );		//  Create copy, not reference


		var num_event_callbacks = this.events[ event_name ].callbacks.length;
		var callback_list 		= this.events[ event_name ].callbacks.concat( this.events._ALL.callbacks );
		var num_callbacks 		= callback_list.length;

		var pc = this.debugger.pc;


		//  Exit if no-one's listening to the event
		if ( !num_callbacks ) {
			this.debugger.log.apply( this.debugger, pc.quickMessage( "Exhaust", "Trigger", event_name, "0 callbacks registered" ) );
			this.debugger.log( "Payload: ", payload );
			return false;
		}


		//  Debugging
		var event_group_name = this.debugger.group.apply( this.debugger, pc.quickMessage( "Exhaust", "Trigger", event_name,  [num_callbacks + " callback" + ((num_callbacks === 1 ) ? "" : "s" ) + " registered" ].join( " | " ) ) );
		var callback_group_name;

		this.debugger.log( "Payload: ", payload );


		//  Loop callbacks		
		for ( var i = 0, len = num_callbacks, ev; i < len; i++ ) {

			ev = callback_list[ i ];

			pc.addMessage( "Callback " + (i+1) + "/" + num_callbacks + ( ( i >= num_event_callbacks ) ? " via _ALL" : "" ), this.debugger.pc.css.info )
				.addMessage( ev.label, this.debugger.pc.css.text ) ;

			callback_group_name = this.debugger.group.apply( this.debugger, pc.parse() );
			
			try {
				ev.callback( payload, ev.label );
			} catch( e ) {
				this.debugger.error( e );
			}

			this.debugger.groupEnd( callback_group_name );

		}
		
		this.debugger.groupEnd( event_group_name );

		return this;
	
	},


	"triggerHistory": function ( event_name, callback, options ) {

		if ( this.eventExists( event_name ) === false ) {
			
			this.debugger.info( '"' + event_name + "\" history triggered but no on() callbacks registered.");
			return false;

		} else {

			options = options || { "label": "- no label -" };
			
			var num_payloads 	= this.events[ event_name ].history.length;
			var payload, payload_group_name;

			var pc = this.debugger.pc;

			pc.addMessage( "Exhaust", this.debugger.pc.css.h1 )
				.addMessage( "Trigger History", this.debugger.pc.css.info );

			var trigger_group_name = this.debugger.group.apply( this.debugger, pc.parse() );

			var group_name = this.debugger.group.apply( this.debugger, pc.quickMessage( "Exhaust", "Trigger", event_name, options.label ) );

			for ( var i = 0, len = num_payloads; i < len; i++ ) {

				pc.addMessage( "Event " + (i+1) + "/" + num_payloads, this.debugger.pc.css.info );

				payload_group_name = this.debugger.group.apply( this.debugger, pc.parse() );

				payload = this.events[ event_name ].history[i];

				this.debugger.log( "Payload:", payload );
				
				try {
					callback( payload );
				} catch ( e ) {
					this.debugger.error( e );
				}

				this.debugger.groupEnd( payload_group_name );

			}

			this.debugger.groupEnd( group_name );
			this.debugger.groupEnd( trigger_group_name );

			return true;

		}

	},


	"triggerPreloadQueue": function( event_name, queue ) {

		if ( typeof queue !== typeof [] || queue.length == 0 ) {
			return;
		}

		var trigger;

		for ( var i = 0; i < queue.length; i++ ) {

			trigger = queue[i];

			if ( trigger[0] == event_name ) {
				this.trigger.apply( this, queue[i] );
			}

		}

	}

};



function ExhaustDebugger( exhaust, pretty_console ) {

	this.exhaust 	= exhaust;
	this.pc 		= pretty_console;

	var w = window;

	this.consoleFn = function( console, fn, args ) {

		if ( typeof args !== typeof [] ) {
			args = [].slice.call( args );
		}

		if ( this.is_enabled && console && typeof console[fn] == "function" ) {
			try {
				console[fn].apply( null, args );
			} catch( e ) {
				console.error( e );
			}
		}

	}


	this.error = function() {
		this.consoleFn( w.console, "error", this.prefixMessage( arguments ) );
	}


	this.group = function() {
		this.consoleFn( w.console, "group", arguments );
		return arguments[0];
	}


	this.groupEnd = function() {
		this.consoleFn( w.console, "groupEnd", arguments );
	}


	this.info = function() {
		this.consoleFn( w.console, "info", arguments );
	}


	this.log = function() {
		this.consoleFn( w.console, "log", arguments );
	}

	this.prefixMessage = function( args ) {
		return [ "%cExhaust", this.pc.css.h1 ].concat( [].slice.call( args ) );
	}

	this.setEnabled = function( bool ) {

		var log_change = ( bool || bool !== this.is_enabled );

		this.is_enabled = ( bool );

		if ( localStorage ) {
			localStorage.setItem( "ExhaustDebugger", JSON.stringify({
				"is_enabled": this.is_enabled
			}));
		}

		if ( !log_change  ) {
			return;
		}

		this.pc.addMessage( "Exhaust", this.pc.css.h1 )
			.addMessage( "v" + this.exhaust.version, this.pc.css.info )
			.addMessage( "Debugging " + ( ( bool ) ? "en": "dis" ) + "abled", this.pc.css.text );

		this.log.apply( this, this.pc.parse() );
	}


	this.warn = function() {
		this.consoleFn( w.console, "warn", arguments );
	}


	if ( localStorage ) {
		var config = JSON.parse( localStorage.getItem( "ExhaustDebugger" ) );
		if ( config && config.is_enabled == true ) {
			this.setEnabled( config.is_enabled );
		}
	}

}


function PrettyConsole() {

	this.css = {
		"text": "background:#ddd; border-bottom:2px solid #6400aa; border-radius:3px; font-weight:normal; line-height:1.5em; padding:.15em .5em;"
	};

	h = "color:#fff; font-weight:bold; border-right:none;";

	this.css.h1 = h + this.css.text + "background:#6400aa;";
	this.css.h2 = h + this.css.text + "background:#ea9900;";
	this.css.info = h + this.css.text + "background:#009BAA;";
	this.css.event_name = h + this.css.text + "background:#777777;";

	this.reset();

}

PrettyConsole.prototype.addMessage = function( text, css ) {
	this.messages.push({
		"text": text,
		"css": css
	});
	return this;
}

PrettyConsole.prototype.parse = function( keep_messages ) {

	for ( var i = 0, p = [], o = "", m; i < this.messages.length; i++ ) {
		m = this.messages[i];

		o += "%c" + m.text;
		p.push( m.css );

	}

	p.unshift( o );

	if ( keep_messages !== true ) {
		this.reset();
	}

	return p;

}

PrettyConsole.prototype.quickMessage = function() {
	this.addMessage( arguments[0], this.css.h1 );

	if ( arguments[1] ) {
		this.addMessage( arguments[1], this.css.h2 );
	}

	if ( arguments[2] ) {
		this.addMessage( arguments[2], this.css.event_name );
	}

	if ( arguments[3] ) {
		this.addMessage( arguments[3], this.css.text );
	}

	return this.parse();
}

PrettyConsole.prototype.reset = function() {
	this.messages = [];
}



window._exhaust = new Exhaust({
	"ExhaustDebugger": ExhaustDebugger,
	"PrettyConsole": PrettyConsole
});

    window.lol1 = data;
    window.exhaustData=data;//Used for firing thirdparty pixel with dynamic product data
    var b = window.utag_data;
    var pageName = data.vendor && data.vendor.adobe && data.vendor.adobe.analytics && data.vendor.adobe.analytics.pageName;

    if (pageName) {
        _satellite.setVar('page_name', pageName);
    } else {
        var dd = window.digitalData;

            _satellite.setVar('page_name', dd.vendor.adobe.analytics.pageName );

});



_exhaust.on('Page.search', function(data) {  
    window.Psdata = data;
  
    var sdata = data;
    // Set Signal Strength
    var signal = data.signal_strength;
        for (i = 0; i < signal.length; i++) {
        var SSt = signal[i];

        if (SSt[0].type.indexOf( sdata.band_chosen_for_strength)  !== -1) {
             data.chosen_band_strength = data.band_chosen_for_strength + ": " + SSt[0].strength;
        }
    }

    // Set Network status code
    var network_code = sdata.network_status_code;
          
    switch (network_code) {
    case "RED_S01":
        var code = "Red Result (S01)";
        break;
    case "AMBER_S02":
        var code = "Amber Result (S02)";
        break;
    case "GREEN_S03":
        var code = "Green Result (S03)";
        break;
    case "BLACK_S04":
        var code = "Black Result (S04)";
        break;
    case "GREEN_S05":
        var code = "Green Result Recent Fix (S05)";
        break;
    default: 
        var code = network_code
    }
    data.network_status_result = code;
    // 
    _satellite.logger.info("Page.search event");
    _satellite.setVar( "exhaustEvent", data._event_name );
    _satellite.track( "Page.search", data );

});

#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-policy-text, 
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-b-addl-desc .onetrust-pc-btn-handler, 
.onetrust-accept-btn-handler, 
#onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-gv-list-handler,
#onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-pc-desc,
#onetrust-reject-all-handler, 
#onetrust-accept-btn-handler,
#onetrust-pc-btn-handler { 
    font-family: "Non-Dottee-Light" !important;
    font-size: 12px; 
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-accept-btn-handler,
#onetrust-banner-sdk,
#onetrust-pc-btn-handler,
#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    border-radius: 16px !important;
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk .has-reject-all-button .banner-actions-container {
    max-width: 60%;
    width: auto;
    display: flex;
}

button#onetrust-accept-btn-handler {
    order: 1;
}

button#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    order: 2;
    margin-left: 11px;
}

button#onetrust-pc-btn-handler {
 
 order: 3; 
}
#onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group {
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
}

#onetrust-banner-sdk .has-reject-all-button #onetrust-pc-btn-handler {
    float: left;
    max-width: calc(40% - 18px);
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-button-group {
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }

  #onetrust-banner-sdk .has-reject-all-button .banner-actions-container {
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }

  button#onetrust-accept-btn-handler {
    order: 1; 
    width: 100%; 
    max-width: 100%; 
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  button#onetrust-reject-all-handler {
    order: 2; 
    width: 100%; 
    max-width: 100%; 
    margin-right: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  button#onetrust-pc-btn-handler,
  #onetrust-banner-sdk .ot-link-btn {
    order: 3; 
    width: 100%; 
    max-width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    text-align: center;
  }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 425px) {
    #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-pc-btn-handler, #onetrust-banner-sdk #onetrust-reject-all-handler {
        margin-left: 0;
    }
}
